card.name: SBI Credit Card
card.description: SBI Credit Card and Debit card users get a flat Rs. 150 off on a purchase of Rs. 1500 & above only on Nykaa.com.
card.target_audience: SBI Credit Card and Debit card holders shopping on Nykaa.com

redemption.process: Enter promo code NYKSBI on the cart page to get Rs 150 off your order
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid only for SBI Credit Card and Debit card holders. Offer valid from 1/02/2016 to 15/02/2016. Can be availed by only one e-mail ID once. Bulk orders subject to Nykaa.com terms and conditions. Customers need to be signed in/logged in to Nykaa.com to avail the offer.

benefits.name: Flat Rs. 150 off on purchase of Rs. 1500 & above
benefits.description: Get Rs. 150 off on a purchase of Rs. 1500 and above on Nykaa.com using SBI Credit or Debit Card.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use promo code NYKSBI at checkout on Nykaa.com
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid only for SBI Credit Card and Debit card holders. Offer valid from 1/02/2016 to 15/02/2016. Can be availed by only one e-mail ID once. Bulk orders subject to Nykaa.com terms and conditions. Customers need to be signed in/logged in to Nykaa.com to avail the offer.
benefits.eligibility: SBI Credit Card and Debit card holders

current_offers.title: Nykaa SBI Bank Offer
current_offers.description: Flat Rs. 150 off on a purchase of Rs. 1500 & above only on Nykaa.com for SBI Credit Card and Debit card holders.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid only for SBI Credit Card and Debit card holders. Can be availed by only one e-mail ID once. Bulk orders subject to Nykaa.com terms and conditions. Customers need to be signed in/logged in to Nykaa.com to avail the offer.
current_offers.how_to_activate: Enter promo code NYKSBI on the cart page
current_offers.eligibility: SBI Credit Card and Debit card holders
current_offers.exclusions: Discount not applicable on personal care
